headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  TARNOW, ALAN M.

snippet: TARNOW--Alan M.,74, of South Orange, on Monday, July 4, 2016. He is survived by his wife Harriet of 53 years, son Josh and his wife Jill, daughter Lisa and her husband Fred Orlan, sister Terri and her husband Dr. Michael Reder, and six grandchildr...
lead_paragraph: TARNOW--Alan M.,74, of South Orange, on Monday, July 4, 2016. He is survived by his wife Harriet of 53 years, son Josh and his wife Jill, daughter Lisa and her husband Fred Orlan, sister Terri and her husband Dr. Michael Reder, and six grandchildren Lily, Jack, Isabelle, Hannah, Julia, and Caroline. Funeral Service will be held 10:30am Wednesday, July 6 at Temple B'nai Jeshurun, 1025 South Orange Avenue, Short Hills, NJ. A memorial donation may be made in his name to St. Barnabas Hospice, 80 Main Street, West Orange, NJ 07052 or Memorial Sloan Kettering for Colon Cancer Research, 1275 York Avenue, New York, NY 10065. 1/3
